mapper.select: select tod.ID as detail_id, tod.COUNT as detail_count, tod.PRICE as detail_price, tod.PROFIT as detail_profit, tod.STATE as detail_state, tod.COMM_ID as detail_comm_id, gi.goods_name as detail_goods_name, gi.goods_cover_img as detail_goods_cover_img from t_order_d tod inner join newbee_mall_db.tb_newbee_mall_goods_info gi on tod.COMM_ID = gi.goods_id and tod.ORDER_ID = #{orderId}
mapper.sql: t.ID as order_id, t.STATE as order_state, t.AMOUNT as order_amount, t.DATM as order_datm, t.PROFIT as order_profit, t.VERIFY_TM as order_verify_tm, t.BASE_P as order_base_p, t.pay_time as order_pay_time, t.address as order_address, t.phone as order_phone, t.receiver as order_receiver, t.express_no as order_express_no, t.express_money as order_express_money, t.deleted as order_deleted, ts.SHOP_ID as order_shop_id, ts.SHOP_NM as order_shop_name, ts.DISTR_ID as order_distr_id
mapper.select: select t.ID as order_id, t.STATE as order_state, t.DATM as order_datm, t.phone as order_phone, t.receiver as order_receiver, t.deleted as order_deleted, t.amount as order_amount, ts.SHOP_NM as order_shop_name, as order_distr_name, ts.DISTR_ID as order_distr_id, gi.goods_name as detail_goods_name from t_order t left join t_shop ts on ts.SHOP_ID = t.SHOP_ID left join t_distr on ts.DISTR_ID = t.DISTR_NM

select t.ID as order_id, t.STATE as order_state, t.AMOUNT as order_amount, t.DATM as order_datm, t.PROFIT as order_profit, t.VERIFY_TM as order_verify_tm, t.BASE_P as order_base_p, ts.SHOP_ID as shop_id, ts.SHOP_NM as shop_nm from t_shop ts inner join t_order t on ts.SHOP_ID = t.SHOP_ID and ts.DISTR_ID = #{distrId} and t.STATE = #{pg.keyword}
select t1.* from t_order t1 inner join t_shop ts on t1.SHOP_ID = ts.SHOP_ID and ts.DISTR_ID = #{distrId} and t1.STATE = #{state}
select ts.DISTR_ID from t_order t1 inner join t_shop ts on t1.SHOP_ID = ts.SHOP_ID and t1.ID = #{id}
select t1.* from t_order t1 inner join t_shop ts on t1.SHOP_ID = ts.SHOP_ID and ts.SHOP_NM like concat('%', #{pg.keyword}, '%')

select t1.* from t_order t1 inner join ( select tod.ORDER_ID from t_order_d tod inner join ( select COMM_ID from t_paf_comm where COMM_NM like concat('%', #{pg.keyword}, '%') ) as t2 on tod.COMM_ID = t2.COMM_ID ) as t3 on t1.ID = t3.ORDER_ID
select t1.* from t_order t1 inner join t_shop ts on t1.SHOP_ID = ts.SHOP_ID inner join t_distr td on ts.DISTR_ID = td.DISTR_ID and td.DISTR_NM like concat('%', #{pg.keyword}, '%')
